definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Solomon (Salwmwn, rarely Salomwn, LXXL mostly Solomwn; cf. Lag:BN 53 96);—king of Israel, son of David and Bathsheba 2Sa 12:24, 1Ki 1:11 + [name 2 t. S; 162 t. K; 109 t. Ch; 7 t. Ezr Ne]; born in Jerus. 2Sa 5:14, 1Ch 3:5, 1Ch 14:4; designated by D. as successor, anointed and proclaimed before D.’s death 1Ki 1:30, 1Ki 1:33, 1Ki 1:34, 1Ki 1:39 +; king after D.’s death 1Ki 2:12, 1Ki 2:17, 1Ch 29:28, 2Ch 1:1 + [phr. ´[[הַמֶּלָךְ שׁ]]: 1Ki 1:34 + 36 t. K, 11 t. Ch, Je 52:20, Ct So 3:9, So 3:11; ´[[הַמּ]] :´[[שׁ]]: 1Ki 2:l7, 1Ki 12:2, 1Ch 29:24, 2Ch 10:2; [[מֶלֶךְ יְהוּדָה]] ´[[שׁ]]: 1Ki 12:23, 2Ch 11:3, ´[[יִשׂ]] :´[[מ]]: 2Ki 23:13, 2Ki 24:13, 2Ch 30:26, 2Ch 35:3, Ne 13:26]; builder of temple 1Ki 5:22, 1Ki 6:1, 1Ki 6:2, 1Ch 5:26 + oft.; wise 1Ki 3:10, 1Ki 5:9, 1Ki 5:10, 1Ki 5:14, 1Ki 10:1, 1Ki 10:2, 1Ki 10:3, 1Ki 10:4, 2Ch 1:7, 2Ch 1:11 +; author of proverbs (and songs) acc. to Proverbs ´[[מִשְׁלֵי שׁ]]: Pr 1:1, Pr 10:1, Pr 25:1 (cf. 1Ki 5:12, 1Ki 5:13), v. also ´[[לִשׁ]]: Ps 72:1, Ps 127:1 (titles), Ct So 1:1 (title); of written provision for priests, etc. 2Ch 35:4, cf. 2Ch 8:14, Ne 12:45; elsewh. (outside of K Ch) name occurs † Je 52:20, Ct So 1:5 (Wkl:Altor. Forsch. ii. 196. prop. Šalmaites, Nab. [[שלמו]] Lzb:376, cf. Levy:Tw ii. 489 Jastr:1587), So 3:7, So 3:9, So 3:11, So 8:11, So 8:12, and in phr. [[בְּנֵי עַבְדֵי]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ezr 2:55, Ezr 2:58 = Ne 7:57, Ne 7:60, Ne 11:3.
